data.caption: Clarification On Price Movement
data.news_body: Clarification on Price Movement

data.caption: Clarification sought from Tiger Logistics (India) Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Tiger Logistics (India) Ltd on September 19 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
